metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1436 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An infinite recursion is triggered in Jettison when constructing a JSONArray from a Collection that contains a self-reference in one of its elements. This leads to a StackOverflowError exception being thrown.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.4.0-1ubuntu0.20.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-1ubuntu0.20.04.1+esm1').
